content: That's really helpful. I've been tracking my reading progress using an app, and it's been motivating to see how much I've been reading. I actually noticed that I've read a total of 1,524 pages in the past three months, which is an average of 508 pages per month. My goal is to read at least 2,000 pages per month, so I need to increase my reading speed. Do you have any recommendations on how to find more time to read or listen to audiobooks?
